```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(ggplot2)
library(apexcharter)
library(grillade)

spark_data <- data.frame(
  date = Sys.Date() + 1:20,
  var1 = round(rnorm(20, 50, 10)),
  var2 = round(rnorm(20, 50, 10)),
  var3 = round(rnorm(20, 50, 10)),
  var4 = round(rnorm(20, 50, 10)),
  var5= round(rnorm(20, 50, 10))
)
```
